properties.Name: Canóvanas, Puerto Rico
properties.descriptio: A strange creature was sighted by eyewitness Madelyne Tolentino in Canovanas, Puerto Rico. The first and most famous sighting in history, it was widely reported across the island and her description became the “standard” image of the chupacabra aroun

properties.Name: Elmendorf, Texas
properties.descriptio: Rancher Devin McAnally of Elmendorf, Texas, shot astrange animal on his land in May 2004. The “Elmendorf Beast” was lateridentified by DNA analysis as a dog with sarcoptic mange (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mange).

properties.Name: Talcahuano, Chile
properties.descriptio: Ranchers in Calama, in northern Chile, reported thatanimals had been mysteriously killed (reports range from a dozen to over 300)in April 2000. Some claimed that a chupacabra had escaped from nearby top-secretNASA tests.

properties.Name: Orocovis, Puerto Rico
properties.descriptio: Beginning around March 1995, farmers and ranchers in rural Puerto Rico (especially Orocovis and Morovis) began finding dead animals that had apparently been drained of blood, with puncture wounds on their necks. Whatever killed the animals was never sigh

properties.Name: Humacao, Puerto Rico
properties.descriptio: Don Francisco Ruiz, a rancher in Humacao, Puerto Rico, found three dead goats apparently drained of blood on May 22, 1995. He reported the mysterious deaths to police, and it was widely reported in the tabloids.

properties.Name: Morovis, Puerto Rico
properties.descriptio: Beginning around March 1995, farmers and ranchers in rural Puerto Rico (especially Orocovis and Morovis) began finding dead animals that had apparently been drained of blood, with puncture wounds on their necks. Whatever killed the animals was never sigh

properties.Name: Miami, Florida
properties.descriptio: The first chupacabra sighting on the mainland United States occurred in Miami, Florida, on March 11, 1996, when a woman (Olimpia Govea) claimed that nearly 30 chickens and goats had been mysterious killed.

properties.Name: Jalisco, Mexico
properties.descriptio: Ranchers and farmers in central Mexico (especially Jalisco state) claimed that 4 sheep and goats had been killed in May 1996.

properties.Name: Sorocaba, Brazil
properties.descriptio: A rancher (C. Rabello) in Sorocaba, Brazil, reported that 9 of his pigs had been drained of blood in May 1999.

properties.Name: Malpaisillo, Nicaragua
properties.descriptio: Farmer Jorge Talavera, of Malpaisillo, Nicaragua, sawtwo strange creatures attacking his livestock at night, and shot one of them inAugust 2000. He later found its carcass, and submitted it to the localuniversity for analysis.

properties.Name: Rio Rancho, New Mexico
properties.descriptio: A New Mexican man found a “chupacabra” carcass in thedesert near Rio Rancho in 2002. He submitted it for analysis in 2005.

properties.Name: Turner, Maine
properties.descriptio: A woman (M. O’Donnell) in Turner, Maine, found abizarre bluish beast in August 2006, and some immediately suspected it was achupacabra carcass.

properties.Name: Cuero, TX
properties.descriptio: In July 2007, rancher Phylis Canion, of Cuero, Texas,found the most famous chupacabra carcass in the world. Something had beenvampirizing her animals, and she found a strange animal near her ranch. Canionbecame world-famous as “The Chupacabra Lady,”

properties.Name: Albuquerque, New Mexico
properties.descriptio: In 2007 two women in Albuquerque, New Mexico, sighteda strange, hairless dog-like animal by their apartment. They managed tophotograph the mystery beast before it disappeared into the woods near the RioGrande river.

properties.Name: Blanco, Texas
properties.descriptio: Jerry Ayer, a taxidermist in Blanco, Texas, was givena strange, dead animal by

properties.Name: Wise County, Texas
properties.descriptio: A man in Wise County, Texas, found a dead, nearlyhairless animal on a golf course in January 2010. Many thought it was thechupacabra, but a zoologist later identified it as a raccoon.

properties.Name: Horizon City, Texas
properties.descriptio: A family in Horizon City, Texas, discovered thatseveral of their chickens had been attacked by an unknown creature in January2010. They believe it was the work of a chupacabra, though no one saw it and itleft no footprints.

properties.Name: Indio Maiz Biological Reserve
properties.descriptio: Investigator Benjamin Radford conducted an expedition into the jungles of Nicaragua in search for the chupacabra. The remote Indio Maiz Biological Reserve was deemed the most likely place in the world to find an existing population of the vampire beasts.

properties.Name: El Yunque: Investigation
properties.descriptio: Author Benjamin Radford visited and searched the El Yunque rainforest, claimed by many to be the birthplace of the chupacabra.
